basics.name: Raúl Federico Lacabanne
basics.label: Full Stack Developer & Master in Digital Arts
basics.summary: Tenured Full Professor of Multimedia Art Production and Digital Art Theory, I am a lecturer and researcher with 20+ years of experience teaching courses at both the undergraduate and postgraduate levels. I specialize in the development of digital assets, including full-stack websites, soundscapes, video art, art installations, electronic art, document digitization and preservation, still images, and video presentations, among others. I am passionate about groundbreaking digital technologies and interdisciplinary working groups. I adapt well to the changing needs of businesses and enjoy researching and applying new frameworks and libraries to streamline the production process.

work.name: Centro de Políticas Públicas en Educación, Comunicación y Tecnología (UNQ)
work.summary: I developed several digital publications for "Development Bank of Latin America and the Caribbean" (CAF), "International Labour Organization" (ILO), "PROMACE, Government of the province of Jujuy"  and "Ministry of Science, Technology and Innovation of Argentina".

work.name: CAF- Development Bank of Latin America and the Caribbean
work.summary: The document summarizes the experience of Mobile Digital Classrooms in Jujuy province and offers recommendations for other educational systems looking to implement similar initiatives using digital technologies. It provides insights into the digital educational landscape, considerations for the transformation of educational systems, and addresses specific challenges in Jujuy across dimensions such as digital infrastructure, governance, pedagogical models, digital content, and teacher training. The document also discusses the implementation of the Mobile Digital Classroom model, the design of a training program for educators, and a survey of potential digital educational solutions for integration in the province of Jujuy.
highlights: Katz, R., Lugo, M. T., Álvarez, M., & Lolácono, F. (2023, October 30). Transformación digital en la  educación: el caso de la provincia de Jujuy, Argentina. Distrito Capital: CAF- banco de desarrollo de América Latina y el Caribe. Retrieved from https://scioteca.caf.com/handle/123456789/2159

work.name: ILO - International Labour Organization
work.summary: The main objective of the publication is to ensure that every child and teenager at the 'Buena Cosecha Center' not only has a good time and forms friendships but also develops values of solidarity, recognizes their rights, learns self-care and care for others, and feels empowered to contribute to improving rights and responsibilities in their community. The goal is for them to leave each day looking forward to returning, knowing their presence is crucial as a protagonist in this communal effort.
highlights: Pedagogical content for the leaders of the care centers of the 'Buena Cosecha Program' in five volumes (Center, Cuyo, NEA, NOA, and Patagonia).

work.name: PROMACE - Government of the province of Jujuy
work.summary: This publication aims to propose a journey with the objectives of strengthening teaching skills to enhance teaching using Mobile Digital Classrooms, and strengthening management capabilities for school leaders to support and advise teaching and learning with the use of Mobile Digital Classrooms in the province of Jujuy, Argentina.
highlights: 'El Aula Digital Móvil (ADM) en la enseñanza. De la exploración al proyecto.' en cinco volúmenes (Niveles: Inicial, Primario, Secundario, Terciario y Directivos).

projects.name: Capacitación Ley Micaela. Por una ciencia y tecnología con igualdad de géneros y libre de violencias. Segunda cohorte.
projects.description: This is a two-course curricular proposal. The first course explores "How does a gender perspective improve research?" and the second on on "How does the gender perspective improve evaluation processes?"

projects.name: Transformación digital en la educación. El modelo de las Aulas Digitales Móviles en Jujuy, Argentina
projects.description: Two-volume digital publication for PROMACE, Government of the province of Jujuy, Argentina. The first one is a "Dissemination piece" (26 pp.) and the second one a "Final report" (77 pp.)

projects.name: Contenidos pedagógicos para los referentes de los centros de cuidado del "Programa Buena Cosecha"
El Aula Digital Móvil (ADM) en la enseñanza. De la exploración al proyecto.
<la-piscine> v2
projects.description: <la-piscine> is a digital art gallery that showcases the works created by students who took Multimedia Arts subjects levels 1 and 4, under the guidance of Professor Lacabanne, as part of the Multimedia Arts degree at the A.T.A.M. of the National University of the Arts.

projects.name: Capacitación Ley Micaela. Por una ciencia y tecnología con igualdad de géneros y libre de violencias.
projects.description: This is a curricular proposal designed by the Gender Program in conjunction with the National Council for Scientific and Technical Research (CONICET), the National Agency for the Promotion of Scientific Research, Technological Development and Innovation (R&D Agency ), the National Commission for Space Activities (CONAE) and the National Genetic Data Bank (BNDG), within the framework of the Replicator Training Program “Ley Micaela” of the Ministry of Women, Gender and Diversity of the Argentina Republic.

projects.name: Rembrandt, the artist
projects.description: A website in homage to Rembrandt van Rijn. Just experimenting with embedded sound, midi and video files.
